title: Similar to Gotham Nights?
content:
I'm lookning for similar fonts to Gotham Nights to show to my client who wants to use something like this. [http://simplythebest.net/fonts/fonts/gotham\_nights.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017175421/http:/simplythebest.net/fonts/fonts/gotham_nights.html "http://simplythebest.net/fonts/fonts/gotham\_nights.html")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017175421im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gotham_nights2_6546.gif)
  
Any suggestions? Could be even a pay-for font.

The link above shows Regular and Bold, but only offeres Regular for download (as do other sites).

Many thanks for any suggestions :)
author: spirelli

comments.content: You'd do a lot better with [Refrigerator](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017175421/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/mark_simonson/refrigerator/) or [Case Study](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017175421/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/linotype_case_study_no_1_virtual/).
